name: MyRecovery
0:
”Alexa, open my recovery”
”Alexa, start my recovery”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my recovery
des:
Start your day with an inspirational list of recovery quotes to help to inspire your day. Start every day, with a little motivation, one day at a time. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
